alfredsnippet.snippet:
Bruce Williams (writing in Macquarie U News, June 1999, about Dr. Richard Stallman's view of the world. Stallman is the originator of free software GNU/Linux):

"One day, science died. Information which once flowed like a river now collected in pools. People began to guard jealously their ownership of these pools, though the water was no longer sweet."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - One Day, Science Died
